Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™ Albumin (ALB) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ Aspartate amino transferase (AST) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ Carbamazepine (CRBM) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ Alanine amino transferase (ALT) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™ Total Iron-binding capacity (TIBC) Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista™ reagent cartridges (ALB, AST, CRBM, ALT, TIBC) for use on the Dimension Vista™ Integrated system.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of albumin, AST, ALT, CRBM, and TIBC in human serum and plasma to aid in diagnosis and treatment of diseases related to liver, kidney, heart, drug monitoring, iron deficiency anemia, and chronic inflammatory disorders.
